alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 16 at 8:50AM MDT until further notice by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Avondale...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River NEAR Avondale. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM MDT Friday the stage was 6.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and continue rising to a crest of 7.7 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM MDT.
